spatial_accuracy.notes: Major plan-to-render deviations. (E1/E2) Balcony space at bottom-left is not represented as an outdoor balcony with balustrade; it reads as an enclosed interior lounge/room. (E2) Internal core (bath/WC) is roughly in the correct region but partitioning and circulation do not match the 2D corridor layout. (E2/E3) Several door locations and swing/orientation cues from the plan are not faithfully reproduced (bedroom entries, bath/WC access, balcony access). (E2) Window placements along exterior walls do not align with the plan; openings are missing or relocated. (E4) Room proportions are altered—left-side living/activity area expands and the bedroom/corridor proportions do not preserve the plan’s stated dimensions/relative sizes.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is generally consistent in the render, but structural/architectural fidelity is weak. (E1) Balcony (and its balustrade / outdoor boundary condition) is effectively missing as a distinct exterior element. (E2) Adjacency relationships are partially preserved (3 bedrooms on right, service core near center), but the corridor/entry relationships differ from the 2D plan. (E1/E2) Built-ins shown in plan (LINEN, ROBE placements) are missing or not modeled where indicated. (E2) Door embedding is inconsistent—several planned doors appear as open wall gaps or are shifted, changing privacy and circulation.

furniture_mapping.notes: (E2) Bedroom furniture is present but not mapped to the specific bed orientations/clearances suggested by the 2D plan. (E5) The left-side 'Activity' room is furnished/treated like a living room, and the balcony area furniture appears interiorized, conflicting with the plan’s outdoor balcony intent. Furniture scale is broadly plausible, but placement does not respect the plan’s room functions and boundaries.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Visually clean and readable isometric-style render with decent lighting and mostly consistent geometry. Minor issues: projection is not strictly orthographic/isometric (perspective feel), and some openings/edges read ambiguously as doors vs wall breaks.

detected_errors.description: Balcony (bottom-left) not modeled as an exterior balcony space; balustrade/outdoor boundary condition is missing.
Balcony access/transition from Activity room does not match the plan (planned opening/door relationship is not faithfully represented).
Bath/WC core partitioning and circulation differ from the 2D plan (door locations and internal wall layout do not align).
Bedroom entry door placements are shifted/simplified into openings, altering corridor-to-room relationships.
Plan-indicated built-ins (LINEN closet and ROBE locations) are missing or not placed where shown.
Exterior window placements do not correspond to the 2D plan; several windows appear missing or relocated.
Proportion distortion: the left-side Activity/living zone and central circulation proportions do not preserve the plan’s relative room sizing/dimensions.
Hallucinated/interpreted interior lounge elements occupy the area that should read as an outdoor balcony.
